Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-51744 affecting package etcd for versions less than 3.5.21-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-51744 affecting package etcd for versions less than 3.5.21-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package etcd is earlier than 3.5.21-1, affected by CVE-2024-51744
